cause.description:
GlobalGiving connects people to great grassroots projects run by different organizations around the world.
One of the projects is a fantastic loan program to women in the NWFP whereby they can start home-based businesses to support their families. Khwendo Kor is the organization that has posted a project on GlobalGiving.
1. Loans to women increase well-being of the ENTIRE family.
cause.mission: A single, simple place for you to browse the many ways you can help others around the world, pick the one you are most passionate about, and give to the solution.--GlobalGiving.
cause.name: Loans for Pakistani Women Affected by the Earthquake
